turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order pizza from Villa monte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: From which location are you ordering from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Arden avenue one

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two pies?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How would you like the first one

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large regular pie with half pepperoni and half mushroom

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and for the second one

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large sicilian pie half grilled chicken and half sausage

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry but this location doesn't offer grilled chicken.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. Get me half plain and half sausage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Still a large?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So to confirm for the first pie I have a large regular pie half pepperoni and half mushroom.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And second pie is a large sicilian, half sausage half plain

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Delivery or pickup

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pickup

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order is complete and the total will be 44.74

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pickup will be in 25 minutes and your receipt will be texted to your phone

items.name: half grilled chicken and half sausage
